definition: dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose

sentences.english: Her bare shoulders were burned by the sun.
sentences.chinese: 她裸露的肩膀被太阳晒黑了。

sentences.english: A strange place for this poem to end. "Nudes," the poem begins.
sentences.chinese: 这首诗在奇怪的地方结束了，诗人以“裸露“开始。

sentences.english: What then is the idea of vapid and obligation-free body baring?
sentences.chinese: 那么，无趣而无偿的裸露，又有什么意思呢？

sentences.english: Nudity is a threat to the basic social contract.
sentences.chinese: 裸露是对基本社会契约的一种威胁。

sentences.english: Freeing to the tooth bares in the sun, sending out radiant diaphragm.
sentences.chinese: 任凭牙齿裸露在阳光下，发出晶莹的光圈。

sentences.english: The cover of turnabout drum has two types, bare steel cover and smooth rubber face.
sentences.chinese: 改向滚筒覆面有裸露光钢面和平滑胶面两种。

sentences.english: Structures and tissues change more when denuded part of the bone is larger.
sentences.chinese: 硬腭裸露面积越大，组织结构改变越明显。

sentences.english: The first and second scrim layers constitute exposed surfaces of the composite laminate.
sentences.chinese: 上下两层薄亚麻仍作为复合材料片层的表层裸露在外。

sentences.english: I have to go with the more common topless enemy within the level, The Temptress.
sentences.chinese: 我得去与敌人更常见的裸露上身的水平之内。

sentences.english: There's a wonderful freedom being nude in a naturist area.
sentences.chinese: 在裸体主义者的地方，裸露是很自由的。

sentences.english: It was an example of how flexible our attitudes to nudity are.
sentences.chinese: 这个例子说明我们对裸露的态度有多么的灵活。

sentences.english: I also love the exposed beams, the use of salvaged wood for architectural details, and the wide-plank pine
sentences.chinese: 我也喜欢裸露的梁，用来修饰的浮木和宽松木条地板。

sentences.english: The cliff exposed on opposite, which faces upwards, is the best location for climbing rocks.
sentences.chinese: 对面石壁裸露，峭壁朝天，是攀岩运动的最佳场地。

sentences.english: Mangy camelsrange, nuzzling the denuded tops of trees.
sentences.chinese: 污秽的骆驼四处游荡，用鼻子蹭着裸露的树梢。

sentences.english: A few inches of your skin making you look way shorter.
sentences.chinese: 此外，裸露的几寸肌肤也会使你整体看上去变矮。

sentences.english: A few inches away, another catalyst, platinum, helps that bare proton become hydrogen.
sentences.chinese: 几英寸外的另一催化剂铂帮助把裸露的质子合成氢气。

definition: to expose (to the air, light etc)/to leave uncovered/exposure
to stick close to/to press up against
to wrap tightly/to wind tightly/to bind/close-fitting (clothes)
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
to be covered with/to be filled with
to cover/to mask/to cover up or conceal (the truth etc)
